languages.text: Угловатый, неудобный и откровенно уродливый пистолет неизвестно чьего производства. Такой дарящий смерть выродок мог выйти из под рук как человека, так и любого из множества рас ксеносов.

An awkward and unimaginably hideous pistol with an uncomfortable grip of unknown brand and origin. This deadly abomination of a weapon could have been made by a human or just as likely by any of the numerous xenos races.
languages.original_text: Угловатый, неудобный и откровенно уродливый пистолет неизвестно чьего производства. Такой дарящий смерть выродок мог выйти из под рук как человека, так и любого из множества рас ксеносов.

traits.locale_text: An awkward and unimaginably hideous pistol with an uncomfortable grip of unknown make and origin. This deadly abomination of a weapon could've been made by a human or just as likely by any of the plethora of xenos races.

An awkward and unimaginably hideous pistol with an uncomfortable grip of unknown brand and origin. This deadly abomination of a weapon could've been made by a human or just as likely by any of the plethora of xenos races.

An awkward and unimaginably hideous pistol with an uncomfortable grip of unknown brand and origin. This deadly abomination of a weapon could've been made by a human or just as likely by any of the plethora of xenos races.

An awkward and unimaginably hideous pistol with an uncomfortable grip of unknown brand and origin. This deadly abomination of a weapon could have been made by a human or just as likely by any of the numerous xenos races.

An awkward and unimaginably hideous pistol with an uncomfortable grip of unknown brand and origin. This deadly abomination of a weapon could have been made by a human or just as likely by any of the numerous xenos races.

languages.text: 不格好で、想像を絶するほど醜悪なピストルは、握り心地が悪く、銘柄も製造元も不明だ。この致命的な醜悪な武器は、人間によって作られた可能性もあるし、いくつかの異種族によって作られた可能性もある。
languages.original_text: An awkward and unimaginably hideous pistol with an uncomfortable grip of unknown brand and origin. This deadly abomination of a weapon could have been made by a human or just as likely by any of the numerous xenos races.

traits.locale_text: 不格好で、想像を絶するほど醜悪なピストルは、握り心地が悪く、銘柄も製造元も不明だ。この致命的な醜悪な武器は、人間によって作られた可能性もあるし、いくつかの異種族によって作られた可能性もある。

languages.text: 这把手枪极其丑陋，而且握起来非常不趁手，不知道是什么人制造的，或许出自人类之手，也或许是某种异形的造物。
languages.original_text: An awkward and unimaginably hideous pistol with an uncomfortable grip of unknown brand and origin. This deadly abomination of a weapon could have been made by a human or just as likely by any of the numerous xenos races.

traits.locale_text: 这把手枪极其丑陋，而且握起来非常不趁手，不知道是什么人制造的，或许出自人类之手，也或许是某种异形的造物。

languages.text: Una pistola extraña y de aspecto increíblemente horrible con un mango incómodo de marca y origen desconocidos. Esta mortífera abominación podría haber sido fabricada por un humano o por una de muchas razas xenos.
languages.original_text: An awkward and unimaginably hideous pistol with an uncomfortable grip of unknown brand and origin. This deadly abomination of a weapon could have been made by a human or just as likely by any of the numerous xenos races.

traits.locale_text: Una pistola extraña y de aspecto increíblemente horrible con una mango incómodo de marca y origen desconocidos. Esta mortífera abominación podría haber sido fabricada por un humano o por cualquiera de las innumerables razas xenos.

languages.text: Eine unfassbar hässliche Pistole mit einem unbequemen Griff. Marke und Herkunft sind unbekannt. Diese ebenso abscheuliche wie tödliche Waffe könnte von einem Menschen oder von einer der zahllosen Xenos-Spezies hergestellt worden sein.
languages.original_text: An awkward and unimaginably hideous pistol with an uncomfortable grip of unknown brand and origin. This deadly abomination of a weapon could have been made by a human or just as likely by any of the numerous xenos races.

traits.locale_text: Eine unfassbar hässliche Pistole mit einem unbequemen Griff. Marke und Herkunft sind unbekannt. Diese ebenso abscheuliche wie tödliche Waffe könnte von einem Menschen oder von einer der unzähligen Xenos-Spezies hergestellt worden sein.

languages.text: Un pistolet particulièrement hideux de marque et d'origine inconnues et doté d'une crosse peu confortable. Cette abomination a tout aussi bien pu être conçue par un être humain que par n'importe laquelle des nombreuses races xénos.
languages.original_text: An awkward and unimaginably hideous pistol with an uncomfortable grip of unknown brand and origin. This deadly abomination of a weapon could have been made by a human or just as likely by any of the numerous xenos races.

traits.locale_text: Un pistolet particulièrement hideux de marque et d'origine inconnues et doté d'une crosse peu confortable. Cette abomination a tout aussi bien pu être conçue par un être humain que par n'importe laquelle des races xénos.

languages.text: Markası ve kökeni bilinmeyen, son derece rahatsız bir sapa sahip, tuhaf ve olağanüstü derecede çirkin bir tabanca. Bu ucube silah; insan yapımı da olabilir, sayısız zeno ırkından birine de ait olabilir... Orası hiç belli değil.
languages.original_text: An awkward and unimaginably hideous pistol with an uncomfortable grip of unknown brand and origin. This deadly abomination of a weapon could have been made by a human or just as likely by any of the numerous xenos races.

traits.locale_text: Markası ve kökeni bilinmeyen, son derece rahatsız bir sapa sahip, tuhaf ve olağanüstü derecede çirkin bir tabanca. Bu ucube silah bir insan yapımı da olabilir, sayısız zeno ırkından birine de ait olabilir, hiç belli değil.
